en.title: FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner, Malaysia, 17th January 2009 (1)
en.content:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner, Malaysia, held on 17th January 2009 at Convention Hall MAEPS, MARDI, Serdang was a GREAT SUCCESS with 1,500 FE Leaders, Members and Invited Guests. Many FE Leaders flew in from overseas to attend, including from Thailand, Philippines, Brunei, Indonesia, Singapore, Dubai, Sudan, South Africa, USA, etc. The Guests of Honour were His Excellency and wife, the Ambassador of Sudan, Nadir Yousif Eltayeb together with officials from the Embassy of the Republic of Sudan, including the First Secretary, Mr Tariq Abdulla Eltom.

Also attending were Zakaria Ab Rahim, Selangor Football Club manager, FE spokespersons, Foo Kok Keong, Jean Daniels, Wong Hong and Ms Law.

Highlights Of The Event Include:

- Grand Entry by the Guests of Honour, His Excellency, Nadir Yousif, Ambassador of Sudan, FE Founder CEO    Paul Ting and FE Founder Director KS Lee leading FE Presidential Directors into the hall.

- Entertainment by Live Band.

- Display of Martial Arts Skills by Chek Quen Do Association.

- Performance of "Quantum Pendant" Song by Presidential Directors KC Phoon and Jeffrey Choong. They    can, not only make money, but also sing! Well done!

- Performance of songs by FE Director from Philippines, Dr Anarie Reyes and by FE Presidential Director Ms    Ariel Lee. Well done! It is great to know FE leaders have great talents!

- Opening Speech by FE Founder Director KS Lee.

- Quantum Pendant demos by KC Phoon and Jean Daniels. As usual, for first timers seeing the demonstration, they    were very impressed!

- Presentation of Quantum Science products to the Ambassador and officials from the Embassy of Sudan    by Paul Ting.

- Speech by PD Pastor Arthur Medina and presentation of souvenir by Judge Lorenzo Venaracion to Paul    Ting and KS Lee in recognition of FE's efforts to help the children of Payatas, Philippines.

- Speech by Thailand Country Licensee Don Chan.

- Installation of New Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors. Congratulations to all for    making it!

- Speeches by New PDs, Mr Wail Shibeika (who is also the Country Licensee from Sudan), Sam Koay and    Lim Joo Wah. Congratulations!

- Closing by PD KC Phoon who as usual fired up the crowd with his inspirational speech. Great job, KC!

- Lucky Draws by His Excellency, Nadir Yousif, Ambassador of Sudan.

A BIG Thank You to MC Lovey Lee and team for a wonderful job!

It was GREAT to see so many happy and smiling faces around, especially FE's Leaders who are making good income. Just like Air Asia where everyone is happy because NOW EVERYONE CAN FLY! With FE everyone is happy because NOW EVERYONE CAN DO BUSINESS! Not just any business BUT a GLOBAL BUSINESS with unlimited scope and very affordable and easy to start !

SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP!! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!
 
< Click here for more photos >
